title: Project Management - Kickoff Meeting
description: A project manager leads the official kickoff meeting for a new firewall deployment project.

tasks.description: Prepare and distribute a kickoff meeting agenda, including project goals, scope, timeline, roles, and responsibilities.
tasks.expected_outcome: All attendees receive a clear agenda before the meeting.

tasks.description: Lead the meeting, present the project plan, and establish communication protocols and meeting cadences.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project manager successfully aligns all stakeholders and sets clear expectations.

tasks.description: Follow up the meeting with documented minutes and action items assigned to both the client and internal team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The meeting outcomes and next steps are clearly documented and distributed.
